scripts.deploy: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy haiphen-graph --gen2 --runtime=nodejs20 --region=us-central1 --project=united-lane-361102 --source=. --entry-point=handler --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --memory=256MB --timeout=30s --max-instances=1 --concurrency=1 --service-account=haiphen-worker@united-lane-361102.iam.gserviceaccount.com --set-env-vars=ALLOWED_ORIGINS=https://haiphen.io,https://www.haiphen.io --set-secrets=JWT_SECRET=HAIPHEN_JWT_SECRET:latest,INTERNAL_TOKEN=HAIPHEN_INTERNAL_TOKEN:latest
